name: 曾俊貴
objective: 本普通物理課程為3學分課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是引導同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並建立爾後修習各相關專業課程之堅實基礎，會強調物理觀念及數學及看懂英文教材內容。本課程本學期之內容包含力學，每週授課三小時。
schedule:
Week 1: ch1  Physics and Measurement
Week 2:ch1  Physics and Measurement
Week 3: ch2  Motion in One Dimension
Week 4:ch2  Motion in One Dimension 
Week 5: ch3  Vectors 
Week 6: ch3  Vectors
Week 7: ch4  Motion in Two Dimensions
week 8:ch4  Motion in Two Dimensions 
Week 9: ch5  The Laws of Motion
Week 10: Midterm examination
week 11: ch5  The Laws of Motion
Week 12: ch6  Circular Motion and Other Applications of Newton’s Laws
Week 13: ch6  Circular Motion and Other Applications of Newton’s Laws
Week 14: ch7  Energy of a System
Week 15: ch7  Energy of a System
Week 16: ch8  Conservation of Energy
week 17: ch8  Conservation of Energy
Week 18: ch9  Linear Momentum and Collisions
week 19: Final examination
scorePolicy:
Midterm examination (期中考) 30%
final examination (期末考) 30%
Quiz (小考及作業) 25%
Attendance (出席率)及學習態度 15%
materials:
Textbook(課本):
1.Textbook:Physics for Scientists and Engineers (10e Raymond A. Serway
John W. Jewett, Jr. ; 滄海書局代理)
2.電子儀表     出版社：鼎文書局      編者：金榜     ISBN：978-957-454-836-1
*(開學第1堂課就要上課就要用到課本每一位同學必須帶以上這2本課本)
*應備基礎或準備事項:高中物理、微積分、英文、高中數學
參考書目:University Physics with Modern Physics and the related computer study (W. Bauer, G. D. Westfall)
